1.content:
Zootopia hid many secrets in its depths, some good and some bad. But there were few that held such interesting mysteries as the quaint little shop sitting between two massive buildings on the fringe of Central Savannah and the downtown area, owned by the strangest goat you'd ever seen. She was a collector of wares of all sorts, some of the strangest items that could exist in such a fascinating universe. She had traveled the world to collect them and wished to share all that she had found. So, she had opened the store, Stephanie's Store, under the guise of selling antiques.

Of course, if you had ever been inside the store and purchased something, you'd know just how much of an underestimate "antiques" was given what these items could do. Though that was part of the fun, Stephanie had decided. Letting her patrons discover the joy of what secrets the world held was why she had founded her place of business in the first place. Not out of any pursuit of money or wealth.

It was a slow day for Stephanie as she sat waiting at the counter, drumming her hooves as she listened to the radio. A few of the regulars had stopped by that morning, but nothing much interesting had happened.

That was all about to change, of course, as the bell at the door clanged out and someone walked in. Someone brand new, who had never stepped foot in Stephanie's Store. Someone who was entering the shop for a very particular reason as yet undecided. But to start, who was it that had discovered the quaint little antique store?
1.title: Stephanie the Goat

choices: She's investigating the shop for a case.
She's looking for something to impress a certain someone.
She's looking for a gift for her family.
She just happened to walk in.
11.content:
Stephanie was already pretty large for a goat. So, she was towering over the small rabbit as she walked into her store. She was a cute little thing, wearing a police officer uniform and with fairly wide hips and big purple eyes. That's when it clicked who this was, as Stephanie had been listening to the news. This was Judy Hopps, the rather famous bunny cop who had taken care of all that Nighthowler business a ways back.

The only real question was why Judy was here.

"Hello there, honey," Stephanie chimed as she turned off the radio. "How can I help you today?"

All patrons came into Stephanie's Store for one reason or another. Sometimes even they didn't know what they were looking for or why. What was Judy's reason?
11.title: Enter Judy Hopps

111.content:
Judy's eyes raised at the extremely and unusually large goat standing behind the counter, but she shrugged it off. The bunny cop had official business in being here and she couldn't be distracted by such things. Besides, she was trying to work on her prejudice since the Nighthowler incident.

"Hello, ma'am," she greeted. "Officer Judy Hopps. I'm actually here to investigate a recent case we had."

"Oh my, a case you say?"

"Yes, ma'am. We recently brought in a suspect who had a rather...Strange item on their person. When questioned about it, they pointed us in the direction of your shop. We don't mean to cause trouble, but would you be able to confirm their purchase as it might be a part of a larger case?"

"Of course, I'd be happy to help. Though it might do better if you described to me what the object was."

"Well...That's sort of the strange part, ma'am. The object broke upon our capture of the suspect so we were unable determine what it was, exactly. However, we did observe it had some...Rather bizarre incidents during the arrest."

"Bizarre, you say?" Stephanie repressed a smile. "Can you elaborate?"

Judy was finding it hard to get out exactly what she was trying to say as she recounted her story.

"Well, we had cornered the suspect who was involved in the case we were investigating. A chase ensued. Perfectly natural for our line of work. But then when we cornered the suspect, they took out this strange vial and drink from it. Then they, well...
111.title: Official Business

1111.content:
"...I don't know how else to describe it," Judy said. "Other than they, well, inflated."

"Inflated?"

"Yeah, you know? Like a balloon. It was just the strangest thing. They took one sip of this...Whatever drink it was. Then their entire body just started expanding like they would do in the cartoons. Exaggerated features and all. I wouldn't have believed it if I didn't see it with my own eyes. The Chief certainly didn't either. That's why I'm here, for proof."

"Proof, huh?"

Judy reached into her belt and pulled out the vial she had kept. Beyond the label was a little detail that noted it was a product sold at Stephanie's Shop, like all of her merchandise.

"The guys in CIS examined it but couldn't even explain what it was. So, I figured I'd go to the source even if it got me laughed out of the station. I know what I saw."

"I see," Stephanie inspected the bottle and knew exactly what product it was. "Very brave of you to stand by your beliefs. Though if it's this item you're after, you're going to have to pick out something more...Specific."

"Specific? What do you mean?"

Stephanie stepped out from behind her counter, showing off her full height to Judy as she towered over the tiny rabbit. Poor bunny didn't even come up to her knees as she gulped and followed Stephanie over to a cardboard display over in the corner of the store. Judy took a closer look.

"Bubblebeer?"

"Named after rootbeer, of course. This is that product that I believe your suspect used. What I was getting at was there are quite a lot of options to choose from. Some use helium, some don't. There's also the shape or size you'd like. Is hourglass up your fancy? Pick a flavor, Officer Hopps. To show my cooperation with you, I'll even let you take one as a free sample."

Stephanie then smiled sweetly and wandered back behind her counter, though kept a close eye on Judy as she ran through her options. She was curious what the young rabbit would pick. And she knew that surely Judy wouldn't be able to resist the curious call of the product, hence the free sample.

As for Judy, she was definitely interesting in the strange brand of soda. She had already seen the effects firsthand, after all. And she would need to prove it to Bogo, perhaps by drinking it if she had to. Who could say? The task at hand was picking the right elixir and their flavor names all gave hints as to what the effects might be.

Judy's paw landed on...
1111.title: The Inflation Getaway

11111.content:
For some reason, Judy's gaze continued to go back to the Buoyant Blimp Berry. The bottle looked very similar to the one she had confiscated from the suspect before they had gotten away. She could remember the sight of the kangaroo as she hopped along the alleyway, stopping to drink the bottle and dropping it on the ground as she began to grow. Her tummy bloated to a giant size before the rest of her caught up, growing bigger and bigger until...

"Officer Hopps?" asked Stephanie. "Are you with us?"

Judy jolted back into reality and felt a redness in her ears. "Sorry! Uh, I think this one will work for the purposes of our investigation. Yes."

"Excellent. Well, I hope it helps! And I look forward to seeing you again real soon."

Judy couldn't help but wonder what Stephanie meant by that as she left the store with her evidence in tow. But she had more important things on her mind.

Though she had managed to determine exactly what she was looking for in the shop, there was still the matter of proving that it was actually responsible for this whole mess to begin with. Even though Judy was a witness, no one in the ZPD was actually taking her seriously. Not that she could blame them. Even after seeing it with her own, Judy still didn't know if she believed it or not. But now she at least had some sort of proof as she entered the station to find a handful of familiar faces waiting for her in the form of Nick and Clawhauser.

"Yo, Carrots," said Nick while he leaned against the front desk. "Where have you been?"

"Oh, just gathering something that will be useful for the chase yesterday. Take a look."

Judy held up the blue vial to the pair of them.

"That's and all, Judy," said Clawhauser. "But it sounds like Bogo is a little...Livid right now."

"What? Why?"

"He's not happy that his top officer seems to believe in cartoons, apparently," Nick answered with his arms crossed. "And then let a potential suspect escape."

"But it's the truth!"

"Well, maybe you might want to explain that to him then if you're so confident in that assessment, Carrots. So, this is the little magic potion that turned our culprit into a blimp, quote unquote?"

"Yes! And I can prove it to you all!"

Judy had an idea. The kind of bad idea that'd usually happen as a result of her being challenged by something. She looked down at the bottle in her paw. When all you have is a hammer...Everything looks like a nail. The only question was who was going to be the one to drink from the bottle?
11111.title: The Buoyant Blimp Berry

112.content:
Judy Hopps was in a bit of a pickle.

It was almost Valentine's Day and she was grossly unprepared, having distracted herself with work that she hadn't been paying attention at all to the date. It was thanks to Clawhauser that she had her reminder literally the morning of. And she desperately needed something to give to her best friend. It was the first Valentine's Day she'd have with Nick. And though they weren't dating yet, Judy desperately wanted to send him the message that she was willing and able to explore something other than "just friends." Of course, she didn't want to be the one to say it. That's why she was here.

She had seen the shop briefly on one of their patrols and it was unusual to stick out in her mind, plus it was on her route to work. She figured it was worth a shot to pop her head in. And when she did, she found the most unusual goat lady she had ever seen waiting for her.

"Hello there, honey. How can I help you today?"

Judy remained quiet for a while as she stared. The goat was huge, even by goat standards. It felt like she was almost as big as Bogo as she leaned over the counter to look at the tiny rabbit.

"...Oh!" Judy replied as caught herself. "Sorry! I guess I am looking for something, but I'm not sure exactly what yet.."

"Of course! We get all sorts. What is your desire?"

"Well, that's the thing this isn't for me, exactly. It's a gift for a friend. A Valentine's Day gift."

"Oooh, I see!" the goat's eyes lit up before she gave Judy a wink. "Well, we definitely have something that might catch your eye and send the right message."

Judy could feel the blush in her ears and couldn't help but wonder what she had walked into. And more importantly, unbeknownst to Judy, what would the item Stephanie offer her do?

The item would...
112.title: A Gift for Nick

1121.content:
Stephanie smirked as she knew exactly what to with the bunny and what sort of change she needed. She needed to see things from another perspective, literally in this case. And fortunately, the goat had plenty of items that could do just that.

Of course, there was only the matter of what she could turn the clueless rabbit into. Going down her mental list of stock items in her inventory, Stephanie decided that it would be best to have Judy transform into...
1121.title: Transforming Judy

choices: In one of the station's offices
At the bridge in the movie
11212.content:
Stephanie had an idea. A bit of a mean idea, but something that would be immensely entertaining all the same as she dug around beneath her counter.

"This friend of yours," said the goat. "Do you ever think that the only gift he really needs is the gift you could provide him yourself?"

"I, uh, I don't know what you mean."

"Darlin', you don't need to get your friend any fancy item to let him know you're interested in you. In fact, I think all you need to give him enough of a hint is a private moment alone with the two of you. Have a nice little confrontation about it, you know?"

Judy did. She had been trying many times these past few months when she had known her feelings to get Nick alone so she could blurt them out. But nothing seemed to work and with their job, they were so busy without a moment of privacy to really get into it. So she never really tried.

"Here's my proposal," Stephanie said, bringing up a strange box. "You take this for no charge. Call this a supplement. It's a special brand of tea that you can use to calm yourself and bring you down a level, in a manner of speaking. Take a bag of it and wait at a private place you know just the two of you will be. Have a drink and just let what happens happen."

Judy wasn't sure how a brand of tea was going to solve all her problems. But there was something to the goat's voice that suggested she should trust her. Judy gingerly accepted the box and said her thanks.

"Are you sure?" Judy asked before walking out the door. "Giving this to me for free, I mean."

"Call it a future investment," Stephanie said with a wink. "Good luck, honey. Don't cheese it now."

Little did Judy know, it was Stephanie's intention to put Judy in a situation where she would be forced to confront Nick without any hope of escape. Judy was being too mousy about her feelings, so it was only fitting that she should be turned into a mouse. The only question was where Judy would choose to meet with Nick, if it was to be in a private setting or someplace a little more public and thus dangerous.

Judy would drink the tea...
11212.title: Mice Tea

choices: Judy instantly becomes a full mouse
Judy slowly becomes a full mouse over the course of the day
Judy gains mousy attributes the more tea she drinks
112123.content:
Judy eventually decided that the sooner she could get a moment with Nick alone, the better. And given she was on her way to work, it seemed like as good a time as any. Everyone preferred their morning coffee at the ZPD, so she would just help herself to a little herbal tea, completely unaware of what it would actually do to her.

She had a special spot in the precinct that she went in to be alone in from time to time. It was one of the smaller offices on the upper floors, too small for most of the big mammals in the building to ever bother with. It was also the perfect place to plug in a Hot Shot water heater and boil up some water for her first bag. Judy set her things down and waited patiently for everything to be ready while she took a deep sniff of the tea.

Though rabbit's weren't known for their noses, there was something heavenly about the aroma surrounding the tea. It was creamy in a strange way with hints of honey to it. And berries? Some sort of berries. The sort of drink that would leave any sweet tooth satisfied.

It certainly tasted sweet as Judy drowned her first cup. It didn't even need any sugar or sweetener too it before Judy smacked her lips.

"Hey, this is really good," she said. "I feel great! And full of energy!"

As the tea settled in the pits of her stomach, it felt like it was warming her whole body. From her head to her toes, Judy felt a surge of heat pass over her and she was resisting the urge to bounce around the whole room. Was this why Stephanie wanted to give her this supplement tea? To give her a boost of energy.

Judy definitely didn't want the moment to go to waste though and immediately dug out her phone to text Nick to meet her so she could speak with him.

As she typed away, she failed to notice that the tea was doing something other than giving her body a boost of energy. Her right ear dipped slightly before it began to slowly shrink in height, becoming squatter and far less like a rabbit's. As it squashed down, it became fatter and rounder too until it resembled the ears of different animal, specifically a mouse. The tea was already starting to take effect and transforming parts of Judy's body as she took another sip. The only question was how the process would work, exactly?
112123.title: Tea Time at the Office

choices: Show Judy what's happened to her and get her to stop drinking
Quietly watch Judy as she drinks more tea
1121233.content:
"Mmm," Judy said as finished her second sip. "This stuff is great...And better than coffee!"

As the tea settled in her stomach, Judy's other ear twitched before it also began to shrink in size and get rounder. It tugged downwards until it was snuggly in place with her other ear until they matched perfectly. No longer did Judy have tall, thin rabbit ears, but short, squat mouse ears. And unfortunately she didn't seem to notice, with her ears being on the top of her head. The only thing that she noticed was that the tea was making her feel great as she took yet another sip.

This time there was a tingle on the little ball of fluff atop her backside. Her small bunny tail twitched slightly before it suddenly surged forward a few inches, losing some of its poofiness along the way. Judy's new, longer tail flapped around excitedly as she took another sip. Almost like it had a mind of its own, it squashed itself down and then pushed itself forward a few more inches. Another sip and a few inches more. Before long, Judy had finished about half her cup of tea and was sporting a full mouse's tail, which was much longer and wirier than her bunny one as it wrapped itself around the table where Judy was drinking.

She had been so engrossed with her drink that Judy had forgotten the reason for it in the first place or that she had texted Nick to come find her in the private office so they could talk.

As Nick walked into the room, his eyes widened in surprise as he saw his partner only she was very different. Her ears looked like they did not belong on her head but were more rodent-like. And her tail...It had grown out and wrapped itself around the table like a snake. Nick closed the door firmly behind him so that no one would see what he was witnessing. The sudden click of the door caused Judy to pause before she could take another sip and look up to smile at him.

"Nick! You gotta try this stuff, it's amazing!"

"Carrots," he started. "What on earth is happening to you?"

"What do you mean?" she asked before she took another sip. "I'm just enjoying a cup of the best tea I've ever had."

Nick was about to point out her ears and tail when he noticed something about Judy's face. Three long strands of fur were sprouting on both of her cheeks, longer and whiter than any other hair on Judy's head. That's when he realized what he was looking at. Whiskers! Judy was growing noticeable whiskers! Only she didn't seem to notice at all as she put the mug from her mouth and smiled at him.

It didn't take long for him to put two and two together that the tea was definitely doing something to his partner, though he couldn't say exactly what yet. Judy held out the box of tea to him.

"Why don't you try some?"

Nick raised an eye while silently contemplating what to do in this particular situation before deciding to...
1121233.title: The More You Sip, the More You Change...

choices: The tea's effects wear off over time
She needs to get bunny tea to change back
She needs to finish a full cup if she wants to change back
11212331.content:
Nick shook his head as he snapped out of it. Whatever this was, it wasn't normal. As he accepted the box, he gave a quick glance over the contents before noticing Judy was about to take another sip of the drink.

"Hey!" Nick stopped her. "Wait, wait, wait, Carrots. Do you seriously not notice what's happening to you by drinking that stuff?"

"What are you talking about? I feel great!"

"Well, you look ridiculous. Here, check it out."

Nick offered Judy his phone with the camera on flip so that she could see her reflection. Judy reluctantly put the tea down as she accepted the camera to witness the changes that had been done. Her eyes widened as she saw herself.

"What happened?" Judy asked, putting the tea down. "My face. My ears!"

"Your tail," Nick offered.

"Nick, this isn't funny! What on earth happened to me?"

"That's what I was wondering until I read this," he offered the tea box back to her. "Here, have a look."

While Nick had skimmed over the box's description, something she had neglected to do when first acquiring the tea. After all, who would expect a simple drink to do this to someone? Upon reading it fully, however, it slowly dawned on Judy exactly what she was putting in her body.

"Mice Tea," she read aloud. "This brand of herbal tea is the finest on the metamorphic market for providing the user a relaxing and enjoyable transformation. For those unfamiliar with our brand, the slow consumption of this tea will cause the user to take on attributes of their chosen animal until they are fully a copy. Oh my god, Nick. This tea is turning me into a mouse!"

"Well, that explains a few things," Nick said. "Does it say how to turn you back?"

Panicked at the thought she might be stuck with mouse ears and a tail forever, Judy continued reading on to discover that...
11212331.title: Investigating the Tea

choices: Drink a full cup for herself and see what happened
Wait for Nick to get home before experimenting
Offer the tea to someone who visits her
Spike a drink and offer it to Nick
112123311.content:
"Effects are almost immediate upon oral ingestion," Judy continued to read out loud. "Revertion is determined upon how much tea was consumed as a dose and the size of the user. Estimated full restoration of one cup is 2-6 hours. Continued consumption beyond initial transformation will multiply the restoration period and may even cause long term effects. Drink responsibly."

"There you go," Nick offered. "You see? You'll be back to your old self in two to six hours."

"Nick, we have to go to work though!"

"Just call in sick, Carrots," Nick shrugged. "Seriously, I'll just go down to the Chief now and let him know you're feeling under the weather and you have to go home. There's a little thing called sick days, Carrots. I know you haven't heard of them given how hard you work, but you should use them sometime."

Judy breathed a little easier. It was nice having Nick with his cool head here else she might end up panicking and doing something foolish.

"How am I going to get home looking like this though?" she asked.

"Here," Nick offered her the ZPD hoodie he was wearing. "Put this on with the hood up to hide your ears and tuck your tail in. Your face is less noticeable but you can always wear a scarf or face mask, right? Just do all that and hurry home then wait there for the effects of the tea to wear off. By then it will be past noon and I can swing by after work to make sure you're doing okay. Sound good?"

"Alright..."

And with that, they put the plan in motion as Judy quietly left the station in her makeshift disguise. Thankfully, with everyone at bullpen, no one noticed her slipping out and no one on the bus paid her close enough attention to notice anything off about her. She made it back to her apartment with any incidents, the tea box still in paw.

By then, it had been an hour since Judy had consumed the tea and she pulled off her borrowed hoodie to notice that her ears, while still very mouseish, were looking a bit longer than they had when this mess all started.

"Thank goodness," Judy sighed in relief as her body reverted back to normal.

It was a slow and curious transformation as Judy lingered around her apartment, looking to pass the time with various activities. Now that she was focusing, she could feel the little changes in her body. Her ears felt like they were being tugged at every time they grew a centimeter longer. Her spine felt like it was pulling back her tail into her body, like a rope, as it receded further and further. Even her whiskers faded before long.

After noon, she looked in the mirror to find her old reflection especially as she remembered it.

Judy slumped into her chair and breathed out all the tension in her body as she looked at the tea box that had been waiting on her desk. Now that she knew these changes were all reversible, she had to admit she was a little curious. What might have happened if she went "all the way?" Could she pause somewhere in between, like she did before? What might happen to someone else if they drank it? Would they notice anything or ignore it like Judy had until Nick pointed it out to her? And why had Stephanie given this tea to her in particular?

All curious questions as Judy began to look at the box again, wondering especially what she was going to do with this tea since she had time to kill before Nick arrived from work to check on her. Judy decided to...
112123311.title: Waiting Off the Effects

choices: Someone else comes to visit in that time
1121233111.content:
Judy eyed the box of tea again as she sat at her desk.

It wasn't so bad if she would just change back in a couple of hours, right? She was really, really curious what might happen to her if she had drank a full cup. And besides all that, it was really good tea. So long as it was something she could control, she would be fine. It was like...An experiment in science class.

Judy started up her kettle and grabbed her carrot pen with the recording device on it. She intended to detail her every experience this time and, at the very least, leave some sort of record for Nick if something were to happen to her. It might have been smarter to wait for him but then she wouldn't be Judy Hopps as she left the tea seep in the boiling water for a few minutes before hitting record on the pen.

"This is Judy Hopps beginning my experiment with the Mice Tea. After my first experience with the tea, waiting for around 3.2 hours allowed for full restoration to my old self as advertised. I am 100% bunny right now about to consume a full dose to observe the effects. This pen has about an hour of audio space on it, so I'll leave it running as I describe the process. Beginning now."

Judy then put the pen down on the table as she took her first sip. Instantly the hints of honey and cream filled her mouth, as she fought from moaning slightly.

"...It's very good," she said aloud as she looked into the mirror. "And my right ear is getting smaller and wider. Taking another sip."

She did so and observed her reflection.

"Now both ears are shrinking down to look like mouse ears, the right one is almost done. It feels strange, like someone is tugging on them and manipulating them like clay. But it's also rather pleasant, though that might be the taste of the tea.

Judy took another sip.

"Oof, now it feels like my spine is growing. My tail is getting longer though only by a couple of inches. Another sip...Even longer now and looking less fluffy too. It feels like something is pulling it out with a pair of pliers. Though it's strange to have complete control over it unlike my usual tail. Another sip and my tail is quite long now and seems to have a mind of its own almost. One more...And it's as long as it was the last time. It looks like a proper mouse tail and I can move it freely."

The next sip was easier to take and Judy noted just how much left of the drink she still had to consume.

"Now this is where I left off the last time before Nick interrupted. I'm growing longer whiskers. I barely felt a thing though I note that my senses are sharper now than before. Next sip is unknown territory..."

Judy took a breath before taking a big drink.

"My mouth...It's getting longer. It feels like there's some pressure in my skull pushing out my face as I...I can see my nose clearly now. I have a snout. All my teeth are surging forward too, including my front teeth. Another sip and my snout is just getting larger as my head is restructuring itself to match. Looking at the mirror and I could pass as a mouse now. A very large mouse. And there's so much of this drink left..."

Judy took a small sip and felt a slight tingle through her whole body.

"I took a drink but nothing seems to have happened. Though I feel...Different. Taking another sip..."

This time Judy felt it as she noticed a dip in her height.

"Okay, scratch that last update. Something did happen. My clothes are looser and the apartment looks a little bigger. Standing up now...Yup, I've shrunk. About two inches. That's quite a lot when you're two feet tall though, or were. Gonna take another sip now while standing..."

As Judy drank, she felt her belt clanged to the floor.

"That was my belt, it just fell off as I lost another two inches in height. I'm about 1/6th smaller than my usual size. The whole apartment is bigger and it feels like someone is pressing down on me. I'm wondering if I should continue because if the tea is accurate, I could become the size of a full mouse. That might make navigating my apartment a challenge..."

Judy stared at the bottom of her cup and noticed only a couple of sips left.

"The heck with it," she said taking a big drink. "Whoa, my pants just fell to the floor and my shirt is huge. I must have lost six inches there and am almost half my size. It's weird but it feels kinda nice. Like someone is gently pressing down on me from above. I'm going to climb the chair now, which is proving to be quite difficult at this height. Omph. Okay, grabbing my tea again..."

There was one sip left in the cup, but at Judy's height, it was too large to finish in one gulp. She swallowed and...

"Woah, okay. I am really small now. And my voice...Wow, I sound really high pitched. I must be eight inches tall, I'm smaller than some dolls I own. My shirt doesn't fit at all, so I'm just leaving it on the chair and trying to climb up to the desk...Urmp, there. Got the cup which is looking huge now, like the size of a huge pot you'd use for cooking. Taking a drink..."

There was just a little tea lining the edges of the cup as Judy found she could no longer hold it up and dropped it on the desk.

"The cup just doubled in size," she squeaked. "Which means I halved in height. I'm about four inches tall now and definitely mouse-sized, though there's still a little drink in the cup. I'm going to squeeze in and go for it..."

Judy crouched down and climbed into the cup, sipping the honey tea lining the rim. As she did, she felt the cup around her grow bigger and bigger until there was no drink left. Judy squeaked as she backed out of the cup and noticed that it was almost as big as she was now. She had shrunk down to less than two inches tall, making her one small mouse. She certainly looked the part now as she walked over the carrot pen which was taller than she was now and hit the record button to pause everything. Judy had to marvel at just how large her room was now, it felt like a canyon. She glanced over to the giant clock on her desk and realized that she still had several hours to kill before Nick got off of work.

What should she do until then?
1121233111.title: Recording Becoming a Mouse

11212331114.content:
Judy was an awe at her situation. The tea had really and truly turned her completely into a mouse as she inspected her reflection in the clock's glass. Her new features, like her ears and tail, were going to take some getting used to. But nothing compared to the thought of how small she was now. It was like everything had gotten gigantic around her as she looked down from her desk at her discarded clothing. The view from above was like standing on top of a building.

"I wonder," she said to herself. "Since I'm smaller, that means I have less mass. Which means..."

Judy took a few steps back and charged to the edge of the table before throwing herself off and onto the chair. In many ways, it was like she was falling from a sky scraper but when she landed it, it didn't hurt at all as she rolled.

"...I can survive high falls!" she cheered as she approached the edge of the chair and jumped again.

Landing on the floor, Judy had an even greater impression of just how small she was at two inches tall. She was 1/12 of her usual height and that meant everything in the apartment was at least twelve times bigger than it normally was from her perspective. Even her belt was bigger than her as she wandered around enjoying the new perspective. It was all rather thrilling to be so tiny. She'd never have to worry about feeling cramped in her room again.

Though her musings were interrupted by a pounding noise that echoed through the whole apartment. Given Judy's smaller size, every noise sounded much bigger and deeper. Even the voice at the door.

"Judy? Are you there? Nick asked to check up on you."

Judy couldn't quite recognize the noise given how its pitch was deeper and changed from being small. But she panicked enough that she bolted to the bed, hiding under it just as the door opened to reveal...
11212331114.title: Mousy Guest

choices: Do nothing and let her mom drink the tea
The right thing and get her mom's attention
Do nothing as Nick arrives home before she can do anything
Tries to stop her mom but gets stepped on as a result
112123311141.content:
Judy gulped at the size of the rabbit that was stepping into her apartment. Normally her mom was a couple of inches bigger than her already, but at Judy's new size she was a towering giant as her two big feet rumbled the floor. But what on earth was she doing here?

The truth was Nick had called Judy's parents over the course of the day. It just so happened that her mom was in the neighborhood and was hoping to surprise Judy. Nick had told her that Judy was feeling a little sick, so of course Bonnie was going to stop by. Nick, however, didn't tell her the truth about Judy's real condition. Didn't mention the tea at all.

Judy remained hidden as her giant mom entered the room and looked around at Judy's discarded clothes all over the floor and chair.

"What on earth happened here?"

Fortunately or unfortunately, Bonnie completely ignored her daughter's pen that she left out on the desk, not even realizing that it was a recording device. Though she did note Judy's cellphone on the desk.

"Hmm, well, she couldn't have gotten far. Maybe she just stepped out for a quick errand and she'll be right back."

Bonnie's eyes turned to the other thing on her daughter's desk. A curious box of tea. She didn't even bother to read the label as she had an idea.

"I know! I'll boil us up some nice tea. Judy loves tea. And maybe I'll have a little cup for myself."

Judy peaked her head out at the sound of that. Her mother was going to drink the tea too? That wasn't good...Unless maybe it was? Judy was kind of curious to watch the effect from afar. Though Judy felt she should warn her mother, that would also mean exposing herself which wasn't ideal either. While Judy fretted over what to do, the water finished boiling and Bonnie poured herself a cup. She was letting it stew for a while, so Judy would have precious minutes to make a decision.

Judy decided to...
112123311141.title: The Mouse's Mom

choices: She goes to Nick's apartment and drinks it.
11213.content:
It hit Stephanie in an instant what this rabbit's problem was. Clearly Judy was reluctant to make the first move into whatever this person of interest of hers was. In fact, Stephanie wagered that the guy was perhaps waiting for some kind of sign that Judy was interested in a relationship. Judy needed to be bold. Confident. Loud. Big! Especially big. And Stephanie had just the thing.

"How do you feel about elephants?" Stephanie asked out of the blue.

"Elephants?" Judy replied. "I suppose they're just like any other mammal. Folks of all sorts. Shades of grey, literally in their case."

"I see. And how about your friend?"

"Nick?" Judy thought for a moment. "I think he likes elephants a lot."

"Does he now?"

"Well, outside of when we first met where one of them didn't have such nice things to say about foxes, I believe 'appreciates' is a better word. Elephants are...Well, they're quite large, you see. And my friend enjoys striking up a good bargain on deals, from furniture to food. Since elephants require so much more substance, they tend to have those items cheaper in bulk."

"I see...Your friend is quite the hustler, isn't he?"

Judy blushed. "Kinda..."

"Hmm," Stephanie wondered out loud. "You know what you really need, girl? You don't need to get your fox any fancy items to coyly hint at your interest in him. What you need is a confidence booster!"

"What, uh, what do you mean?"

Stephanie reached down below her counter and pulled up a glass bottle filled with a curious orange liquid and marked with a sticker that looked suspiciously like an elephant.

"What I mean is what your fox would probably appreciate it if you just up and asked him out on a date. Skip all this awkward dancing around the issue and take a sip of this. This is the Essence of Elephant. One skip and you'll feel as bold and as big as one."

"I, uh. I dunno..."

"And I stake so much claim on it that I'm willing to let you try this sample for free," Stephanie said with a wink. "I promise, it ain't got nothing unnatural or any drugs in it. It's just a little boost to work up the nerves to talk to him. What do you say?"

Judy was truthfully having a hard time saying no, especially if it was for free. She gingerly accepted the vial as Stephanie lowered it into her paws.

"...Why not?" Judy finally relented. "I've been trying to get his attention for months. Might as well, right?"

"That's the spirit, honey! Now, the elixir only lasts for twelve hours. Make sure you drink it in someplace that offers enough space for your new ego. Oh, and mind your clothes during the process."

Those were all odd details but Judy was a bit more preoccupied over other things. Like when she was going to approach Nick? Or when she was going to consume this strange potion?

The answer to that last question was...
11213.title: Elephantizing Judy

choices: A potion based on Judy's mood
112134.content:
Judy decided that if she was going to work up the courage to ask Nick out, then the best thing she could do was put herself in a private scenario where it would be hard to back out of. After work would be best and Nick's apartment was the closest to the station. It was a simple matter of mentioning that it had been a long time since they had a movie night together, something that was pretty ordinary for the pair. And so the friendly movie night was set, with Judy carefully patting the orange vial she kept hidden in the side pouch of her uniform.

Work proceeded uneventfully and they headed straight to Nick's place on the same bus.

While Nick's apartment was certainly larger than Judy's cramped quarters, it was more a basement than anything else. Nick even slept in a dresser instead of a bed, with most of the furniture having been designed for elephants. Like Judy had mentioned to Stephanie, Nick appreciated a good deal and sometimes those drawers came with forgotten clothes from their previous owners.

As soon as they arrived, Nick offered to order and pizza and start up the movie while Judy excused herself to go the bathroom.

Looking at herself in the mirror, Judy sighed and pulled out the elixir.

"Alright," she whispered. "This is supposed to make me bold as an elephant? Well, let's see..."

She uncorked the bottle and leaned back, guzzling it all down in one sitting. The mixture was surprisingly sticky and almost sweet. In fact, it was kind of like peanut butter, which Judy supposed was fitting. As it settled down in the pit of her stomach, she could feel her guts churn. The elixir was certainly doing something and Judy suddenly felt a little woozy as she stumbled out of the bathroom.

"You alright there, Carrots?" asked Nick.

Judy just smiled while clenching her gut as it wriggled with butterflies. "Oh yeah, I'm fine..."

Of course, in reality, the potion was beginning to work its magic all over Judy's tiny body. Stephanie never did mention how the elixir was supposed to work. It could be a fast potion that happened almost instantly or perhaps a relative change, altering parts of her bit by bit. Then again, it might also change Judy based on her mood, the more bold and bigger she acted the bigger she'd get.

What sort of potion was this?
112134.title: The Elephant in Nick's Apartment

choices: Keep it a secret for now.
1121342.content:
Fortunately or unfortunately, the potion Stephanie had given Judy was the slow sort. The kind that took its time and worked it way up so that the user could enjoy every second of the transformation.

Judy sat unaware of this fact on the couch as she assured Nick she was fine and the two of them began to watch the movie he had picked out. Her stomach had already settled into place and now the promise of pizza soon wasn't such a bad idea as a deep hunger took root. The potion was starting to do its work, making tiny changes about her biology beneath the surface so that neither Judy nor Nick would notice. It wouldn't be long before one of them did notice something.

Ever worried for his friend's well being, Nick would occasionally break from watching the movie to have a look at Judy and make sure she was looking less green in the gills. Judy was so engrossed with the movies that she didn't even detect the stares from her foxy companion.

On one of those glances, Nick did notice something though.

Were Judy's ears looking...Bigger? They were always kind of large, being a bunny. But strangely enough they seemed even larger than usual. Maybe not longer, persay. But wider and thicker. And it only became more and more noticeable as the movie went on that Nick afforded himself more looks at his companion. It came to the point that Nick had to admit that, yes, Judy's ears were getting bigger and strangely shaped, not like a rabbit's at all. But her ears weren't the only thing getting larger either.

"Whew," Judy said as she shifted around the couch and unzipped the neck of her uniform a little. "I might have to cut back on the doughnuts Clawhauser keeps offering. This uniform is feeling a little tight."

Nick politely smiled and debated whether he should inform Judy that her ears had all but abandoned their typical bunny shape and showing no signs of slowing down. Though he had a healthy bit of curiosity. Surely whatever was happening to his friend wasn't hurting her, else she'd might notice.

Would Nick reveal what's happening to Judy or would he let this play out more? He decided to...
1121342.title: Elephant Ears

choices: Small tusks start to stick out of her mouth
11213421.content:
Nick could feel his tail twitch. Was he getting excited by all this? It was the strangest thing but Nick was definitely curious to study whatever was happening to his partner and Judy had a habit of overreacting, especially in a situation like this. No, he was going to keep quiet and see how this played out before alerting Judy to what was happening to her.

He continued to watch her ears get bigger and bigger before the doorbell rang.

"That must be the pizza," Nick said, rising from his seat and to the door. "Hungry?"

"Starving!" replied Judy as she hefted herself from the couch.

Nick's smile hid his raised eye as he noticed that when Judy stood up, she came up quite a bit higher on him than usual. Was she getting taller as well? Her uniform was starting to look a little snug on her in all the right places. In fact, she looked curvier in general. Her butt had noticeably more omph to it as it jiggled about while she walked to the kitchen table. Her ears had gotten wider and wider, no longer did they look anything like a bunny's ears as their weight made it so that they flopped over. But Nick couldn't quite put his paw on what they reminded him of. Even her chest was getting bigger as Judy took off her vest just to breathe while sitting down at the table.

"I can't explain it," Judy said as Nick set the delivered pizza down in front of her. "I feel swollen all of a sudden...Larger, but in a good way."

"Oh yeah? Well, let's work on that appetite then.

As Nick opened the pizza box for her, revealing Judy's favorite carrots and broccoli pie, she licked her lips. There was a strange hunger in her eyes as she chowed down, finishing half the pie before Nick could even put away his first slice. He was far too distracted studying her and watching to see what might change next since her ears were completely different.

What would alter about Judy next?
11213421.title: Keeping Quiet About Her Transformation

112134212.content:
As Judy munched on her pizza, she continued to swell and grow. Even with her vest off, she felt constrained by her shirt and unzipped it a little so that she had a little room to breathe. She also took off her belt, dropping it on the floor as she began to turn her attention to finishing up her pie. Eating a whole pie on her own was something she had never done before, but on the last slice, she found that was still hungry like she had gone days without eating. Even though the chair began to creak under her weight. Though that wasn't the only thing changing about Judy.

As Nick watched her eat, he noticed that her two buckteeth that every rabbit had were starting to migrate as if clearing the way from Judy's consuming maw. They settled in opposite corners of her mouth before they changed again. The flat edges started to sharpen, almost like they were becoming canines. Only they were sticking themselves further out of Judy's more than any tooth usually would. That's when Nick realized exactly what they were.

Tusks, he thought to himself. And those ears. Is Judy...Turning into an elephant somehow?

Nick couldn't even begin to explain how that was possible. Mammals didn't just up and change species like that on a whim. But the more he stared at Judy, the less distinct her features were as a rabbit and the more she reminded him of an elephant. This was especially true when the two of them rose to put away their dishes.

"I could eat more," Judy said as she hoisted herself up. "But I'm feeling a little fat right now so I shouldn't."

"Well, there's plenty of leftovers in my box if you..."

Nick's voice trailed as he stood up next to Judy. Normally, she came up to his chest barely in height. Now she was coming up to his snout. She had grow almost half a foot in height over the course of the dinner. Her uniform was starting to look strained as it struggled to accommodate the increase in scale, both vertically and horizontally. Her limbs were much thicker. Her butt had gotten huge as there was an audible groan from the seat of her pants. She had even started to develop breasts as two mounds began to press against her tight shirt. Nick wagered it wouldn't be long before he was looking up at Judy, and she still hadn't noticed a thing. That was because certain attributes like her fur and face remained untouched. For now.

Was she really turning into a a full elephant? Or maybe she was becoming part elephant, part bunny? In terms of percentages, Judy was becoming...
112134212.title: From Teeth to Tusks

1121342124.content:
The art of transforming someone from one species to another wasn't a precise science. And Stephanie had concocted an elixir that did exactly what she said it would. Make Judy big and bold. But not a full elephant, somewhere in between that and a bunny.

Judy looked up at Nick as her stomach began to rumble, drawing her attention away from the fact that she wasn't so tiny compared to Nick anymore.

"Oof," Judy moaned. "You know, I am feel a bit peckish still. If you don't mind me eating your pizza..."

"Not at all. Have at it, Carrots..."

Judy didn't even bother sitting down this time as she just opened the pizza box over the table and began to shovel the remaining pizza into her mouth and over her growing tusks. Nick's attention had turned to Judy's butt which was in his face due to her leaning over as she became more and more engrossed with the food. There were a few threads snapping as Nick watched his partner's caboose inflate before his very eyes.

"This is good," said Judy as she smacked her lips. "But not quite hitting the spot. Do you have anything else?"

"Huh?" Nick snapped back to reality. "Oh. Well, I don't have much, Carrots. You know me, never in the apartment a lot anyway. I got a few things, I guess. Some cans of soup. Maybe some grilled cheese. Or if you want peanut butter sandwiches--"

"You have peanut butter?" Judy dropped the pizza box entirely as she sounded completely excited. "Where?"

Nick gulped as he made a startling discovery the moment Judy stood up. They were now standing nearly eye to eye, just short of three feet tall. Nick couldn't take his eyes off Judy as they shuffled into the kitchen together. Her uniform was quite snug as Nick could hear more and more threads snap under the pressure. Nick was so distracted by all this that he bumped into the counter and strained to reach up to the top shelf of his cabinet. The place where he kept the peanut butter.

Judy frowned at her friend struggling and gently pushed him aside.

"Here, let me try..."

Judy stood up on her tippy toes and reached up, coming just short of the jar just like Nick had. But she licked her lips and reached a little harder and...

Judy grew.

Right before his eyes, Nick watched as his friend's body stretched and elongated until the jar was in reach. Then she snagged it and dropped back down to the floor, unaware of the fact that Nick, formerly much bigger than her, now was at eye level with her mouth. Her uniform was on its last leg as Judy struggled with the peanut butter jar, not even noticing the differences done to her body.

"Blasted thing," she said, her paws clumsier than usual.

While Judy grew from eating, other changes were starting to be noticeable as Nick detected that...
1121342124.title: The Bunnyphant

choices: Judy finally realized something was wrong with her.
Judy had a tremendous growth spurt that bursts her out of her clothes
11213421241.content:
There was a good reason why Judy was struggling with the jar as Nick noticed her paws were loosening their grip on it. Her fingers were starting to look stubbier making it harder for her to get a hold on anything. And her claws were becoming bigger and duller. It didn't take long for Nick to realize what was happening to her now. Her paws are turning into elephant hooves...

"Got it!" Judy said as she managed to tug off the top with her misshapen paws.

The sweet scent of peanut butter filled the air as Judy began to shovel it into her mouth. As she did, her paws only became more bulbous and less dexterous. She eventually had to put the jar on the counter because it kept slipping out of her grip. The peanut butter also seemed to accelerate her growth spurt.

With each mouthful, Judy only seemed to be getting larger and larger. Nick felt his heading tilting up and up as Judy began to consume more of his kitchen. Her stomach had grown as well as her hips and arms, making her look properly overweight. In fact, she just looked thicker in general, with her limbs growing to match the rest of her curves. Somehow, against all logic, her uniform was managing to hold onto her curvy body for dear life. Even her new breasts had gone from the size of apples to melons as Nick looked up at them. It occurred to him that he was now below her chest level, she had become a gigantic bunnyphant making Nick feel very small indeed as the growing showed no signs of slowing down. Her head was getting closer and closer to the ceiling.

Judy was about halfway done with the jar when she stopped very suddenly. It was as if she had made a realization.

"Carrots?" Nick asked, though the nickname didn't feel very fitting anymore. "Are you okay?"

That was when...
11213421241.title: Paws to Hooves

choices: Judy's fur starts to fall out
112134212411.content:
Judy looked a little disorientated as she took a deep breath. And then another. That was when Nick knew what was coming.

"Ahhh," Judy said. "Ahhhhh. Ahhhhhhhh. CHOOO!"

With her increase in size, Judy's normally dainty sounding sneezes now echoed through the kitchen. When the dust settled, Nick looked up at her to discover that her nostrils were wider. Much wider. In fact, they had almost changed the shape of her face entirely, like the sneeze had caused her nose to explode almost.

"Carrots?" Nicked repeated.

"Ahh," Judy responded. "ACHOOOOO!"

This time her nose seemed to explode off of her face entirely from the sheer force of the sneeze. Then it dangled just above her chin, like it was broken only it wasn't. Nick should have expected this as it was the most distinct feature of an elephant besides their size. Judy was growing a trunk!

"Ahhh," Judy said one last time. "AHHH. AHHH...!"

On the final sense, there was no "choo." Instead, the sound of a trumpet filled the kitchen as Nick covered his ears watching as Judy's tiny trunk extend to comical proportions before rest at Judy's neck. It no longer looked like someone had just pulled her nose off of her face, but it was thicker and bulky just like a real elephant's trunk. Albeit entirely covered in fur. In fact, Judy's whole body was still coated in her usual grey fur. Nick had to wonder if that was going to stay consistent or if Judy was going to start shedding in a massive way soon. There was still the matter of her tail too, which remained a fluffy white bunny tail. Not to mention Judy's size.

Judy was getting pretty big as she rubbed at her trunk, unfazed as she brought her new appendage down into the jar and began sucking out the peanut butter. But as big as she looked to Nick, she made for a wimpy elephant. Nick did the math in his head real quick. Normally, Judy was around 60 centimeters tall while he stood at 90 in comparison. As she was now, he wagered that Judy stood at 130 centimeters or a little over twice her normal height and a great deal bigger than Nick. But the average female elephant in Zootopia were giants in comparison, with a mean of about 400 centimeters tall. Meaning that Nick's poor apartment was unlikely to hold her if she ever got to full size.

The only question was what was going to change about Judy next as she finished up with the peanut butter?
112134212411.title: Packing a Trunk

choices: Half the size of an elephant, small enough to fit in the apartment
The full size of an elephant, getting quite cramped in the apartment
Beyond the size of an elephant, exploding out of the apartment
1121342124111.content:
Nick watched as the wads of peanut butter traveled up Judy's new trunk like a vacuum cleaner in big gulps. She was behaving as if having a trunk was the most natural thing in the world, despite the fact that she had never been part elephant before. It was almost like even if Nick pointed out anything now, Judy still wouldn't notice what had happened to her body. And with each mouthful, she only seemed to be changing more and more.

Nick could hardly believe that her uniform was keeping together through all this, yet somehow against all logic, it maintained its shape and form despite the cracks forming along the seams. Every gulp from the jar seemed to add another inch to Judy's already impressive stature as her head grew closer and closer to the ceiling and her uniform groaned more and more. Nick found himself now coming up to her belly in stature, making him feel quite small. He suddenly had the fear of what might happen if she got so large that she ended up breaking his apartment.

"Hey, uh Carrots," he said trying to get her attention. "Maybe you should slow down a little bit."

Judy paused, putting down the jar as she looked past her belly and bosom to see Nick standing there significantly smaller than she remembered him being.

"Nick?" she asked somewhat confused. "What happened? How did you get so small?"

"Me? Small?" Nick had to laugh at that. "Carrots, maybe you should look in a mirror right now."

"What do you mea--Oooh."

Judy moaned as her insides churned. It felt like something was trying to push itself out from the base of her spine, where her fluffy white tail still was. Something that was causing a burning sensation. But try as she might, with her increased weight, Judy couldn't reach around to grab it with her clumsy, swollen pads.

"Nick," she groaned. "This is going to sound weird, but I need you to pull my tail."

"You need me to what?"

"Pull my tail, as hard as you can. I can't reach it for some reason..."

It was a bizarre request as Nick had ever heard, but he didn't like seeing Judy in this kind of distress. He carefully sidestepped her bloated form and did as was asked, grabbing hold of the wiggling ball of fluff. With all his might, he pulled expecting to meet some sort of resistance. Instead, the tail came along with him like he was pulling it out of her body, though a glance told him it remained firmly attached, albeit much longer. That's when he realized what was going on as Judy's bunny tail was being stretched out into that of an elephant's.

A noise of pleasure leaked out of Judy's mouth. "Harder, Nick."

He had to admit to see Judy in this kind of state was something he had never seen before. And it was a little arousing as he continued to pull with all his might. The tail was getting longer and longer as Judy ran her hooves all up and down her body. It was certainly the most sensual thing they had ever done together and the fun didn't stop there as Judy's trunk swirled around and settled in her mouth. She breathed in deep and blew out through her snout, causing her entire body to swell up like a balloon, growing both wider and taller. She was inflating herself bigger somehow, despite how illogical it was to physically do such a thing.

With her now distinctly elephant-tail in paw, Nick could only watch as Judy's growth accelerated and she took up more space in the kitchen. The only question was just how large she'd end up and if she'd wreck his apartment in the process. Judy would grow to...
1121342124111.title: Tall Tail

choices: Was back to being a bunny
11213421241111.content:
Nick dropped Judy's now long, elephant tail as he stood back to take in what was happening to his partner. She was making herself giant which was fitting considering, outside of her grey fur, she looked completely like an elephant now as she swelled upwards. It was when her head hit the ceiling that Nick realized the danger he was in.

"Wait, Carrots. Stop!"

Judy paused. She was standing at around 200 centimeters or 6'7, half the size of a typical elephant but more than twice as tall as Nick was. He didn't even come up to her waist anymore as he gulped at the sight of his partner, who just an hour ago was shorter than he was. With her big purple eyes glancing down to him, he suddenly felt like a toy to her.

"But Nick," Judy protested. "I could get even bigger."

"I know," he said quietly, trying to envision what a fourteen foot tall Judy would look like. "But here's not the place for that. You'll break my apartment and then what are we going to do?"

Judy looked around, only seeming just to notice how small everything had gotten. Even her uniform was straining to remain attached, having stretched well beyond its limits almost magically. A smile formed under Judy's trunk as she eyed Nick again, who was tiny and small to her eyes. He gulped as her trunk began to snake around his hips as she leaned over to face him, eye to eye.

"Fine," she said. "I suppose we don't want to crush my little fox. But you'll just have to make it up to me."

"Oh, uh, yeah?" Nick replied as Judy's grip tightened around him. "How's that?"

"You'll see," she giggled before hoisting him into the air.

While Nick could almost certainly pry himself free from Judy's grasp and make a break for it, he actually didn't want to. It was a little exciting to be the little guy for a change and Judy was certainly making her intentions clear as she dragged him into the bedroom. She fell back on the bed as the entire mattress moaned under her extreme weight. She plopped Nick down right on top of her flabby belly as her trunk continued to coddle him while the two of them undressed.

What followed was a night of the most bizarre and exotic passion Nick and Judy both had ever experienced. They were at it with each other into the late hours of the night, both thoroughly enjoying themselves and Judy's new form, before exhaustion finally set in and they both passed out, Nick still on top of Judy. Neither was quite sure what all this meant but that was a conversation to have in the morning.

And as morning came and shined a light on the new sleeping couple, Nick opened his eyes to find that Judy...
11213421241111.title: Half-Sized Fun

112134212411111.content:
The mattress Nick found himself waking up to was less vast than he remembered. He opened his eyes to find that Judy was snoring peacefully in his arms, only it wasn't the Judy he remembered going to bed with. Judy was back to being a bunny again.

Nick thought for a moment. He was sure he could remember every detail up until the point of climax, but it could have been a dream. But then why was Judy in his bed? As he sat up, he saw more evidence of her transformation into part elephant. The legs of Nick's bed had all completely snapped off and the frame was on the floor. Judy's uniform had also been tossed to the side, only it had gotten completely stretched out to her previous shape and height.

"So, she was an elephant," Nick muttered to himself. "Or a bunnyphant. But that doesn't explain how."

As Nick sat up in the bed, Judy also stirred. Her purple eyes focused on Nick as she came to.

"Nick?" Judy asked with a yawn. "What are you doing in my room? And..."

Her eyes trailed down to see that Nick was sitting naked on his side of the bed. Her ears burned as she glanced downwards towards her own body and immediately covered up with the blanket.

"...Nick, did we?"

"Yup," Nick replied with a smile. "You mean you don't remember?"

"...I remember the movie," Judy said, rubbing at her head. "And the dinner after that. But everything else...It's fuzzy."

"Everything else?" Nick asked with a raised eye. "I thought elephants were supposed to never forget."

"Elephants? What are you talking about?"

"Carrots, I don't know how to say this without sounding crazy but, last night you turned into an elephant. Or part elephant. You were still fuzzy like a bunny, but you had all the other features of an elephant. Including the size and big personality to go with it."

Judy huffed a laugh. "Come on, Nick. You're having me for a laugh."

"See for yourself."

Nick reached out under the bed and hoisted up Judy's uniform. Only it was stretched out and torn in a bunch of areas. It looked as though something very large had tried to squeeze its way into it. Certainly much larger than her, almost four times as big in fact as it fell like a blanket on top of the bed. Judy inspected it and shook her head as she suddenly remembered another detail from last night.

"There's just no way..."

With a sheet wrapped around her body, Judy made her way to the bathroom. There she opened the trash can and found the orange vial that she had drunk before dinner. The one with an elephant sticker on it.

"Carrots?" Nick asked from behind her. "What is that?"

"...A confidence booster," she replied. "The shopkeeper called it Essence of Elephant. Said it lasts for twelve hours and I should drink it someplace that offers a lot of space and mind my clothes. But I thought she was just joking."

"I don't think it was a joke, Carrots..."

"Oh, my gosh! You mean I actually turned into an elephant?"

"Well, a bunnyphant, more accurately."

"Nick, this isn't funny!"

"I didn't say it was. But it was actually kind of fun being the smaller one for a change."

Nick closed his mouth like he had let something slip out. Judy eyed him curiously.

"Wait...Are you saying you liked me as an elephant?"

"Well," Nick admitted with his own blush. "It was certainly different than anything else I've ever experienced. And it was kind of cool to watch you slowly transform like that. And the night together...Yeah that was kind of fun."

Judy's blush intensified as she stared down at her feet, unable to meet Nick's eyes. "Do you...Want me to do it again?"

"I mean, I don't want to force you into anything, Judy."

"I didn't say forced. I'm kinda...Curious myself. Now that I know this is a legitimate thing, maybe I can stop by that shop and...Purchase a few goods to have some fun together. You know, once and a while. Maybe soon."

Nick's smile widened. "I could be game for that. How soon were you thinking?"

"Tonight, maybe?"

"Heh, eager much?"

"Kinda," Judy's toes curled. "I need to get home though. Get a change of clothes. And then we got work. But after our shift today, I'll stop by the shop and see...What I can find. Then meet back here, maybe?"

"Sounds like a plan," Nick said with his arms crossed. "Looking forward to it."

"Likewise..."

~

That whole day at the office, Nick and Judy both had a hard time meeting each other's eyes. They had a dirty little secret they were keeping and everyone in the precinct could tell that something had happened. No one was just quite sure what. Though Judy continued to work, she had a hard time focusing as she tried to imagine the exotic pleasures that awaited her that evening. Nick was also looking forward to what she could find at the shop.

The day finally ended and Nick raced home to try his paw in cooking. Just a little dinner to share in before their night together as he patiently watched the clock waiting for Judy to show up.

Just as the water boiled, there was a knock at his door. He casually leaned on the frame as he opened the way for Judy, dressed in less restrictive clothes this time and carrying a large wooden box.

"Hi," Nick said. "Whatcha got there?"

Judy was already blushing. "Oh, I just got back from the store. Spent a small fortune on this and other, um, elixirs. She apparently has a bunch for different species, and I just couldn't resist. Take a look."

Judy set the box down on the kitchen table and pulled out...
112134212411111.title: Back as a Bunny

1121342124111112.content:
Judy held up a bottle that was a different color and label than the elephant one. "I kinda wanted to try this one out, so we at least don't destroy your apartment by outgrowing it. But still be pretty big, you know?"

"Well, let's see here," Nick said as he took the blue elixir this time and noted the logo. "A hippo?"

"Yeah, I've kinda been remembering last night a little better. We had to stop before I got too big. I figured we could save the elephant for when we had proper space. Maybe book an elephant-sized hotel somewhere when I get my next paycheck."

He handed the bottle back. "Oh, fancy big spender there. First these little potions and now a hotel room."

"Well, I mean, I still have plenty of savings. Besides a new apartment, I can't think of anything to spend money on. And who knows? Maybe if we start to, um, like this arrangement of ours, we might be able to save living expenses in general in the future. Maybe."

"Why, Carrots. Are you asking to move into me?"

Bunny felt herself blush as she fiddled with the cork on the bottle. "I mean, it's still too early to even talk about that kind of thing. I get it. Right now we're just having fun. But if you ever want to make it official..."

"Tempting," Nick gave a sly smile. "Something to think about later. For now, I propose a toast to a fun evening."

"Yes," Judy's ears were completely red at this point. "A fun evening! One I'll hopefully remember this time."

"What did happen anyway?" Nick asked as he pulled out two wine glasses. "Did the shop keeper say anything?"

"I did ask. She explained to me that the first time is always a little intense, especially if you're going from one extreme to the other like I was. I was kind of suffering from sensory overload which simplified my thought process to base needs like food and...Intimacy. This time around, I should remember it better and be more aware of what's happening to me. And it should be easier with each elixir."

"Good to know," Nick replied as he poured himself some wine while Judy filled her glass up with the blue hippo potion. "I'll certainly be more helpful this time around now that I know you're into it."

"I'm looking forward to this," Judy smiled as she sipped down the new concoction.

Nick downed his own drink while he waited patiently for Judy to finish the elixir. The countdown had started and their evening was set, with no going back. Judy polished off her glass and smacked her lips.

"This one tastes like...Berries? It's making me feel a little intoxicated already but I don't seem any different otherwise."

"It was bit by bit the last night," Nick explained. "We can sit down to have dinner in the meantime. It took you a couple of hours before you were fully transformed."

"Really? Huh, I wonder what will happen first?"

Nick couldn't help with wonder that too as he kept a close eye on Judy for the first signs of any alterations. As it would so happen, the first change into a hippo would start with...

As Nick served their dinner of pasta and salad, he did a double take as he glanced at the top of Judy's head.

"Hey, uh, Carrots? You're looking a bit smaller there."

"Smaller?" Judy asked as she looked down at herself. "That shouldn't be. Hippos are supposed to be big! I want to be big."

"I meant your ears, Carrots. They're shrinking down to match a hippos'."

"Oh."

Judy reached for the tips of her ears to find that she didn't have to strain herself too hard to hit the tops. Her ears were definitely shorter. If she focused, she could actually feel them recede into her head very, very slowly. They had already gone down about an inch and were getting smaller by the moment.

"So," said Nick as he began to munch on his dinner. "You want to be big, huh?"

"Huh?" Judy's dwindling ears suddenly turned red.

"Don't deny it, I just heard you say it. That's the reason why you picked out hippo and started with an elephant, isn't it? Secretly deep down, you like the thought of being the big one in the relationship, don't you?"

"What about you?" Judy asked.

"Don't try to turn this one on me, Carrots. I am perfectly willing to admit that there's something kinky about being the tiny one in bed for a change."

"I guess...," Judy muttered as she picked at her salad. "I've always been on the short side, even among rabbits. It's kinda...Thrilling to experience the opposite for a change, you know?"

"I know," Nick said. "Want to make it more interesting then?"

"What do you mean?"

What did Nick mean by that?

Instead, Judy quietly paid for her gift and bagged it up to head home, a chance to wrap it in some paper before she handed it over to Nick tomorrow on Valentine's Day. Judy thanked Stephanie and quickly went on her way.

One long bus ride later and she eventually got home to her apartment and dropped the device on her desk, taking a moment to examine it more closely now that she was alone.

As soon as Judy dropped the gun, she had also taken a step back and hit her bed. It was odd though that they strangely seemed a size or two bigger than usual. Though that thought quickly turned to concern as she watched them begin to swell.

Her bedroom was filled with the sound of what sounded like fabric being pulled out tightly, only it wasn't clothing but the skin of her feet being tugged out as that part of her body began to grow. Her toes ballooned up as she clenched them. She could feel them getting larger as they surged forward into massive proportions, stopping only once they were double their normal size.

Judy was stunned as she stared down at her enormously sized feet, at least from her perspective. Cautiously, she lowered herself to the floor and found her balance had shifted as her feet took up much more space in her apartment. She stomped around a bit, careful not to trip over anything as she adjusted to the new difference in her body's makeup. It was like walking around with cement on her feet, something that she had the unfortunate experience of knowing firsthand. What had happened, she couldn't quite explain. Her feet had swollen to twice their usual size after being hit by the beam from the ray gun.

The pieces weren't quite put together yet as Judy's fascination with her bigger additions turned to fear at the sudden knock at her door.

"Everything okay in there?"

Judy jumped as she recognized the voice of the person that had come to her apartment, no doubt to check up on her after hearing her shriek and wonder aloud at her predicament. Momentarily, the gun remained forgotten on the floor as Judy tromped over to greet who was knocking.

Judy's heart just about stopped as she opened the door to reveal Nick, the last person she wanted to see in this moment of distress.

"Nick!" she practically shouted. "I mean, what are you doing here?"

"Oh, you know, I was in the neighborhood," replied the fox, his paws suspiciously behind his back. "Found a lovely flower shop that just opened up and didn't want it to go to waste. I know it's a little early but...Happy Valentine's Day."

Judy had been doing her best to hide her gigantified feet from his sight by walking around her bed. She was having a tough time keeping her cool though when Nick revealed a large bouquet of violets, her favorite flowers. Though she still wanted to do her best to keep her plus-sized stompers away from Nick's glance.

"Oh, Nick...You shouldn't have."

"I just figured I'd save us the trouble of the awkward glances we'd probably get if I showed them to you at work," Nick said before noticing her discomfort and frowning. "You don't like them?"

"No! No, I love them. I just...Don't know if I have any place to put them in this tiny little apartment."

"How about your desk then? I can go out and buy a vase. Here take them and--"

"W-Wait!"

Judy sighed as Nick looked a little hurt by her sudden rejection, knowing that he had probably come here to be considerate and she was blowing it. What was she being nervous for? This was just Nick, they had been through stranger places together. Surely he'd believe her if she told him what had just happened to her.

"Look, I'm sorry, Nick. But you caught me at an awkward moment. You're not going to believe this but..."

Judy stepped out from behind her bed as her massive feet made the floorboards croak. Nick looked down as she wiggled her toes.

"...Is it just me or do your feet look a tad...Bigger, Carrots?"

"It's not just you. See that gun there?" Judy pointed at the dropped ray gun now next to Nick on the floor. "I bought that at a weird thrift store this morning and was hoping to give it to you as a present. The lady there was really strange about it and it sounded like a good idea at the time. But I fired it by accident and a laser shot out and bounced off the mirror, hitting me in the feet. Then when I looked down..."

"No way. It made your feet grow?"

"I guess?"

Nick gingerly picked up the device and studied it.

"Well, you're in luck, I think. If I'm half the detective Bogo thinks I am, this knob here can control if something grows or shrinks, depending on if it's over the 'G' or the 'S.' What do you say we put that little theory to the test, Carrots?"

"Nick, what are you...?"

But she was too late to question him. The fox had that wild look in his eyes like whenever he was about to do something slightly naughty. He raised the gun and pointed it her, grinning as a beam of light came out and struck her again. This time, however, Nick had aimed at...

Judy was far too slow to block or dodge as the bolt struck her right between the eyes, faster than lightning. It was a red bolt this time, however, not green like before. She briefly wondered what that meant before something odd happened.

It was almost like her vision was being condensed somehow. She felt like she was falling into her uniform as the collar brushed against her cheeks and her ears felt unusually heavy on the top of her head. Stumbling awkwardly on her giant feet, Judy turned to the mirror on her wall and was aghast at the sight. Her ears had gotten gigantic! Only that wasn't quite it as she looked a little closer at herself. If she compared it to the size of the rest of her body, there was no denying it. Nick had shrunk her head to about half of its usual size! Bringing her now massive looking paw to the front of the face and gasping as she was now able to cover it entirely only confirmed it.

Judy found it hard to object to that logic, especially since Nick was the one holding the ray gun as he played with the knob again and aimed at her. Surely there wasn't too much harm in messing around with this if it could all be reversed, right?

"Let's see. What do we want to grow next?"
