Nick couldn't turn down a deal like that, but he also couldn't help but wonder what he had walked into with this mysterious shop. Both the goat and the suit were giving him strange vibes as he stepped inside the booth and closed the curtains behind him. He then began stripping down just as requested by Stephanie.

"Just how am I supposed to get into this thing?" he asked, holding up the suit.

Now that he was closer to it, he was noticing just how small it was compared to his foxy form and the only hole large enough seemed to be the gaping mouth. It was strange but the suit almost seemed to change as he held it. Like it was recognizing his needs and slowly making slight alterations to itself. It was bizarre, but the more Nick looked at it, the more he realized that the suit kind of reminded him of...
1211.title: The Bunny Suit

choices: Amazed, and goes out as Judy
Horrified, and tries to take the suit off without flipping the switch
Curious, and wants to try different suits
12111.content:
The face that was staring back at gave Nick pause. Was he crazy or did the suit look curiously like the very person he was trying to get to know better? How was this supposed to help exactly? Was the intention to scare her or...?

"Spend a day in someone else's skin," Nick muttered to himself.

Pure curiosity now possessed Nick as he pulled open the mouth of the suit so it was wide enough to begin fitting his feet inside. The first two things he noticed were just how tight and how warm the mass of fur was. Despite feeling very constricting, the suit seemed to expand with his leg as it worked its way down to the feet. Bunny feet were some big shoes to fill though, and while the rest of the suit felt tight, his toes had some freedom at the bottom. Then he worked his other leg inside as he pulled it up to his waist.

Glancing to the mirror, it looked like some bunny creature was devouring him in a comical fashion. Nick huffed a laugh as he worked on fitting his arms in next.

The more of the suit he worn, the more compressed he felt like he was wearing something made of latex. Though the skin had a durable pull to it, like it was a big blanket. It hugged to his body, keeping his foxy frame as he wiggled his tail into position. Then his arms. All that was left was the face.

Stretching out the mask, he managed to fit the nose over his long snout, much too long to look anything like a bunny. His ears shifted into place inside the head as he looked at himself in the mirror. He looked like a mutation between fox and rabbit, with the grey fur and ears of a bunny but his old, lanky body shape and predator-like face. That fact disappointed him.

"So, is this just supposed to do anything else," he called out to Stephanie. "Or...?"

"Did you hit the switch on the back of the neck?"

He hadn't even noticed that at the base of the head, just before the spine, there was a metal switch buried under the folds of the fur. Without a thought, Nick flicked in and was immediately overtaken by the most intense feeling he had ever experienced.

It was like his entire body had turned to jelly as the already tight suit felt several degrees more tighter somehow. Nick struggled to keep himself upright against the wall as he made a new discover. The changing room was getting bigger, though that wasn't exactly the truth. He was getting smaller.

Every part of his body was being crushed and pressed down as Nick watched his eyeline shrink closer and closer to the floor. Before his very eyes, his long snout began to press itself closer to his face as his teeth rearranged themselves. The only parts of him that seemed to be growing at all were his feet and his rear, which he felt swell as the world pressed down on his shoulders. He glanced over to the mirror as he watched in awe as the fox wearing a bunny suit looked more and more like a certain bunny with each passing second.

As the intense transformation, Nick realized that he had dropped almost 1/3 of his usual height and he was staring at a perfect, naked clone of Judy albeit with green eyes instead of her usual purple.

"That worked, right" Stephanie called back to him. "How do you feel?"

Nick gathered his wits and determined that he felt...
12111.title: A Mile in Judy's Skin

121111.content:
"This," he said in a voice that was distinctly not his own. "Is amazing!"

Nick stepped out of the changing room as he took in his new perspective. Everything seemed much bigger than it had just a few moments ago. This was especially true for Stephanie, who was now more of a towering presence than she had been before as she stood over him with her hooves on her waist.

"Like it?"

"Definitely," replied Nick as he took a moment to run a paw down his new body. "I really look and sound just like her, don't I?"

"Down to the last detail! Speaking of, you might want to put some clothes on..."

Nick hadn't even considered that, as wearing the skin felt almost like wearing a suit. He could still feel his own body trapped within, cramped and crushed into a shape that it wasn't used to. But it also wasn't uncomfortable either, almost like he was rolled up into a ball. Though he recognized that he couldn't exactly go walking around as Judy in the nude.

"Oh, right. Sorry..."

Nick grabbed his old outfit left in the changing room, which only highlighted just how much he had shrunk. He was able to wear his old green shirt as a dress particularly and the pants had to be held up by his paws.

"Well, first thing's first, I should probably get some clothes that fit me like this."

"Mmm, good plan," Stephanie commented.

"How much do I owe you for the suit?"

"Nothing at all, my friend. Call this a free sample. Something tells me you'll be back for business soon enough."

Though that assumed a lot, Nick had to confess it was not unfounded. He could see a dozen scenarios in the future where he might need a disguise. And if she had suits for mammals of all sorts then he could go posing as anyone. The thought was almost as exciting as what he was going to do posing as Judy. The ideas made his toes curl.

"Well, I'm off then."

"Right! Just remember, you need to flick the switch to get your form back to normal before removing the suit. Otherwise your body will be stuck in the shape of a rabbit."

"Got it."

And with that, Nick was off as he stepped out onto the street, hoisting up clothes that were much too big for his bunny body. It was incredibly exciting to see the whole city from a new perspective, but he commanded himself to focus on the task at paw. He needed some clothes to complete the disguise. And he had options.

He could go to Judy's apartment, who was out and about at the moment. He'd have plenty to choose from there. There was also going to the station where he could get one of her police uniforms. Or he could always just go clothes shopping on his own and buy something Judy might never wear.

What would he choose?
121111.title: Out as Judy

1211113.content:
With Judy taking the day off, it was too risky to go to her apartment and try on some clothes there out of the fear she might catch Nick. And the station would be too public if Nick were to just waltz in there disguised as Judy with only his old clothes. What would the other officers think of that? So, his only option then was to get some fresh clothes.

"Guess it's a good thing the suit was free," Nick commented as he checked his wallet.

Nick wasn't much for fashion, as if that wasn't evident by his own tastes in clothing. But when it came to this matter, there was something exciting at the thought of having to dress Judy up. There was an evil smile on his face as he turned down the street and headed for a store he knew for a fact that Judy had never once stepped foot in before. Victigeria's Secret.

Having had several girlfriends over the years, Nick was quite familiar with shopping at the deluxe female's store, as he passed by the posters of a tiger posing in underwear with bedroom eyes. But he had never actually shopped there for himself. It was the habit of most boyfriends to attend as he glanced around to see the various couples. But he was there to pick out something that Judy would never in her life be caught wearing, though would look good on her all the same.

Nick started with the basics, getting fitted by a friendly employee who didn't once question why he was wearing oversized clothes. With his sizes determined, he got to work picking out a lace bra and matching panties. Next he grabbed a tiny black dress in Judy's measurements that would highlight her butt as well as be comfortable enough to walk around it. Then he went to the makeup section of the store where they had an employee offering to apply everything for a price. After haggling a bit, Nick walked away with eyeliner, lip stick, and eye shadow all properly in place to make him look gorgeous.

"Looking good, Carrots," he said, winking in the mirror.

He was having quite a lot of fun posing as Judy so far, the world was different when it saw him as a bunny girl. Everything was bigger, for one, but people also treated him nicer. What's more was that he was getting attention too, but it so happened one such eye on him was someone he knew. It was...
1211113.title: Clothes Shopping as Judy

choices: Continue posing as Judy and say she "got together" with Nick
Have Clawhauser pose as Judy so they can "get together"
Decline in the idea, but now Clawhauser's following him
12111132.content:
"Judy? Is that you?"

Nick's new rabbit ears picked up the sound of a familiar voice, though it took him a second to realize that he was the one being addressed. He turned around to be greeted by the largest cheetah he had ever seen. That had in part to do with the fact that he was still getting used to being at Judy's short stature. But Clawhauser was also a pretty hefty sized cat, which made him all the more larger from Nick's stunted perspective. He was barely at knee level with the cat as Clawhauser leaned over to get a closer look at Nick.

"Is it!" Clawhauser squealed. "Oh em goodness, what are you doing here? You're the last person I expected to be shopping around at Victigeria's Secret."

"What am I doing here?" Nick asked. "Clawhauser what are you doing here? Do you have a girlfriend I don't know about?"

"Not exactly," Clawhauser said, giving a nervous laugh as he held up a pair of particularly large silk panties. "I just find them comfy and they make my thighs chaff less."

"Huh. To each their own then."

"So what are you doing here then? And why are you all dressed up like that. I've never seen you wear makeup before."

"Oh, you know. Just having a little fun, trying to look pretty. Who knows? Maybe catch the eye of someone..."

"Are you finally trying to make a move on Nick?"

That question caught even the real Nick off guard as he let out an honest nervous laugh. "What, hah uh, what do you mean by that?"

"Aw, come on, Jude! I've seen the way you two look at each other. We all have! So, spill it. Is this some plan of yours to get his attention? Because I can help!"

"That's alright, Clawhauser," Nick tried to step away. "I got this."

"But I wanna help! You know, there's actually a pool going on at the office when you two are going to get together and how."

Nick stopped in place as his money senses tingled. "There is?"

"Yeah! So, of course I want to help! For the sake of love as much as making enough money to buy tickets for the next Gazelle concert."

Nick thought for a moment. He hadn't considered potentially using this Judy suit for the sake of profit. Maybe he could work it out so that he'd be able to make a quick buck and buy even more suits like this to play around with. He continued to think for a moment as he glanced back to Clawhauser, wearing a coy smile that he normally did when he was hustling someone.

Nick decided to...
12111132.title: Cornered by Clawhauser

choices: Follow Clawhauser and see where this goes
Lose Clawhauser by turning back into himself
121111323.content:
Nick paused in his racing thoughts for a moment. As much as he loved money, that kind of back dealing would probably put a hamper in his relationship with Judy, which was the whole point of this to begin with. To get closer to Judy and understand her better. Maybe this was that first step in a lesson of sorts.

"Well," Nick said to Clawhauser. "That's good to know, I guess. But I still want to go at this on my own, thanks."

"Oh...Okay."

And with that Nick turned to leave. He kind of had a desire to be in his own skin for a change instead of trapped as Judy. The dress and makeup was nice but he couldn't help but feel he was drawing the wrong sort of attention, especially the way Clawhauser was looking at him and following him as they left the store.

"Something up, Clawhauser?" Nick asked.

"Oh! I just...Wanted to see if you wanted to hang out. I never see you do this sort of stuff and it always interests me. So..."

Nick raised an eye as the cheetah rubbed the back of his head. Strangely enough, Clawhauser was also a little red in the ears. No way...He couldn't also have unrequited feelings for Judy too, could he? That could be interesting, if Nick wasn't posing as Judy right now. Though maybe he could learn more. Or maybe he could find a way to give Clawhauser the slip so he could turn back to normal. Then again, maybe it was this "new Judy" that Clawhauser was having sudden feelings for. Maybe Nick should just come clean to him and reveal himself. As Nick tugged at the bottom of his dress, he decided to...
121111323.title: Friendly Feelings?

1212.content:
And with that, Stephanie pulled out a carrot.

Nick was surprised by the item the goat showed him. It’s maybe Judy’s favorite vegetable and food in general, but how a carrot could help him understand better his best friend?

“You seem perplexed Mr. Wilde,” the goat said.

“I mean… I don’t understand how this carrot can help me with my friend Judy” Nick admitted frankly.

“I see. However, this carrot isn’t a normal carrot. It’s a magic item I found in a mysterious forest and it has some extraordinary properties. It should enable you and Judy to understand each other like never before,” Stephanie explained with conviction.

Nick couldn’t believe what the goat was saying. He didn’t believe in magic anyway, but he could feel this shop and its objects had something special.
If the goat weren’t lying, this carrot could be an interesting experience for him and Judy.

“Okay, your ‘special’ carrot intrigues me! How much does it cost?” the fox asked.

“I offer you this item for free! I have the feeling this ware is more useful for you than in my shop.”

“Really? That’s so kind. Zootopia would be a better city with sellers like you!”

“How sweet you are! I hope you will be satisfied. Before leaving, I didn’t tell you how it works” added Stephanie.

The goat explained to the fox that he had to eat this carrot before going to bed while thinking of his best bunny friend.
The pleased fox then left the shop still curious about the strange object he was holding in his hand.
He followed step by step Stephanie’s instructions with the carrot and fell asleep.


**Beep Beep Beep Beep**

Nick was woken up by an unfamiliar alarm clock bell. He had the feeling his head was going to explode.
He slowly opened his eyes and turned off the alarm clock with his paw. Surprised, Nick realized he had gray fur on his arm.
Besides, it turned out that he wasn’t at his apartment: it was Judy’s.

Then everything came back to his mind: the strange shop, the magic carrot…
The fox didn’t understand, what was going on. Indeed, Stephanie hadn’t been really clear about the effects of her product yesterday.
He stood up, feeling smaller than usual.

“Judy, are you there?” Nick couldn’t help asking, surprised by his female voice that sounded a lot like his best friend’s one.

There was no response: Nick was alone in Judy’s apartment. He was completely lost.
“What the hell is going on,” he thought.

He looked for a mirror that he finally found in the bunny’s bathroom.
What he saw in the mirror froze him: he couldn’t see his own reflection but Judy’s one. He moved his body towards the mirror and Judy’s reflection perfectly mimicked his movements.

The former fox stayed in front of his new reflection for a long time, trying to understand the circumstances which led him to this inexplicable situation.
Stephanie’s words “It should enable you and Judy to understand each other like never before” were resonating in Nick’s mind.

“So, am I Judy right now?” he said out loud.

Then, he decided to…
1212.title: A mysterious carrot

choices: Himself (Nick's in two places at once somehow)
12123.content:
Considering Nick had went to sleep as a male fox and woken up as a female bunny, he was taking the situation extremely well. He supposed it had to do with the unspoken attraction he had to Judy. Being in her body was actually a little exciting. Being a former hustler, he had gotten used to the idea of acting and having to pretend to be someone else to open doors. While he never literally had to be someone else before, it wasn't much different than that. From an outsider's perspective, no one would be able to tell the difference that it was him in here. He could completely pose as Judy, he certainly knew her habits and quirks well enough from being up close to her all day.

Nick sat up for a moment, taking in the strange sensations and feelings that came with his new body.

For starters, his sense of smell was greatly reduced. He felt like he had a cold from how little scents he was picking up with his bunny nose. However, the ears more than made up for it in how they were able to pick up sounds from all over the apartment complex. He could actually hear one of Judy's neighbors singing in the shower all the way on the other side of the building, if he focused hard enough. There was also the matter of being in a female body.

While Judy was lacking in the chest department, she more than made up for in in the lower body which was mostly muscle. Nick felt light as he skipped across the floorboards effortlessly. The balance without his fox tail was different, but his body seemed to move naturally on his own.

"Thank goodness for small miracles," he said to himself as he looked in the mirror at Judy, still wearing her pajamas. "Well, I guess we just gotta start the day as normal and let whatever this is work itself out."

Worst case scenario, he could always go back to Stephanie's shop and have her solve things. It was their day off from work, so he had plenty of time to kill.

"I guess that means getting dressed first..."

Changing was a little awkward in that, though it was technically his own body, he wanted to give Judy as much privacy as he could. So, he closed his eyes when he removed his shirt and pants, fiddling around the dresser for some jeans and a simple shirt he had seen Judy wear on multiple occasions. When he opened his eyes again, she was standing there dressed and ready for the day.

"...I'm not looking forward to having to go to the bathroom," he muttered to himself. "Well, Judy Hopps, we're ready to pretend to be you for the day, aren't we? Shall we head to Stephanie's Shop first and get more details on what's happened to us?"

And with that he nodded to himself and started for the door, but not before there was a knock. Nick frowned, he didn't know Judy was expecting company. But this would be a good opportunity to put on his acting chops and pretend to be her if it was someone who required it. As it happened, the person(s) knocking at the door happened to be...
12123.title: Judy for a Day

123.content:
“See, what I'm looking for is something which allows me to go unnoticed… for a surprise for a friend.”

Nick couldn’t actually tell the goat his real reasons. Indeed, Chief Bogo assigned Judy and him a new secret case regarding a drug gang in Zootopia. This case had to be resolved quickly because this gang was selling a new dangerous drug containing toxins of night howlers. Its spreading through Zootopia was dangerous for the safety of the city.
The fox and his bunny partner needed a disguise to infiltrate the gang and this shop could be helpful.

“To go unnoticed,” the goat repeated perplexed, “So, you want people to not recognize you?”

“Um… yes, exactly,” the fox replied.

“I think I have many items which correspond with your request,” Stephanie said excitedly.

She then went into the back shop to look for some interesting wares for the fox.

Nick enjoyed this moment alone to get a better view of the room.
He had never seen such a mysterious shop in Zootopia. There were many strange objects and antiques stored on old shelves that barely stood.
Even with the mess inside the shop, the items seemed to be harmoniously categorized.

The goat came out of the back room and showed him…
123.title: A tool for a special mission

1231.content:
The goat came out of the back room and showed him an old watch but still in good condition.
The item wasn’t made by a luxury brand but appeared to be valuable.

“I think I can still be recognized with a watch,” said Nick with sarcasm.

“If only you knew its properties, you wouldn’t say that,” the goat answered with a mysterious tone.

“Try convincing me,” the fox replied, skeptical.

“Ok, Mr. Wilde. This watch has three crowns: one to change time, another for the chronometer, and the last one is… very special!” Stephanie said excitedly.

She explained to her fox customer that the watch allowed the owner to turn into a ghost by pressing the third crown. The user could therefore enjoy a ghost’s abilities like taking over someone’s body or turning invisible.

Nick was doubtful concerning Stephanie’s item. However, if she were telling the truth, this watch would be very useful for the investigation and make his life more interesting.
Indeed, he could become whoever he wanted.

“You are really persuasive,” the fox said.

“It’s my job after all. And to be more convincing, I offer you this watch for free,” replied Stephanie, laughing.

Nick was pleased with his good deal. He knew he would come back to this shop someday.
He then left and decided to try the watch and its ghost powers on…
1231.title: An old watch

13.content:
The wide cheetah did not usually feel this way, but this place, so cramped and tightly packed with shelved made him feel very self conscious about his size.
He wondered around, trying to put a finger on why this particular shop called his attention.
Stephanie was a bit amused by his demeanor so she asked from across the counter
"Hello there, honey. How can I help you today?"
She looked very odd, her weird clothing, the jewelry adorning her, and over all her huge size, she was even bigger than Clawhauser. He was not one to judge, but all of these things created an unnerving aura around her.
"I was just... looking for a gift..." he said nervously "It's for someone special..."
"Sorry if this comes off as rude dear, but... do you feel uncomfortable in your own body?" She asked "Or is it that you want to be more attractive to this special person?"
"Well... yeah... you're kinda right... I want to impress him but... I don't think I'm quite his type."
"Say no more, I have just what you're looking for! So do tell... What is it about you that you want to change?"
Clawhauser answered...
13.title: Enter Clawhauser

132.content:
Clawhauser answered "My weight... "
"Oh honey, you and a thousand others. What's wrong with your weight anyway?" she inquired in a deadpan tone.
Clawhauser paused for a second, not sure if she was mocking him. But he decided to answer anyway.
"Well... It's just that... "
132.title: My weight

choices: His clothes quickly began feeling tight
He met someone on the way
1322.content:
"It's just that I'm too thin... Oh, I know, I know, I'm not exactly skinny, but he... he's more into elephants and rhinos... I jus..."
At that point Stephanie interrupted him. "Don't worry dear, I understand more than you think."
She took a trinker from behind the counter, a shiny golden earring, and put in in Clawhauser's paw.

"What's this?" he asked confused.
"an earring, wear it and I'm certain you will impress that person. Consider it... a good luck charm of sorts."
Her answer sounded a bit cryptic and the cheetah was clearly not convinced.
"Tell you what honey, take it now, and you can pay me later only if you're satisfied with the result."
"Oh...Okay... Thank you... Should I leave you my name or something?"
"Don't worry dear, a cute face like yours is hard to forget. Good luck."

She waved him goodbye and he left a bit weirded out. But whatever, it was free stuff, and he had to admit, it looked rather cute.
So he put the single earring on his right ear and made his way home.
On his way something happened.
1322.title: I'm too thin

info.brief_description: Come join the inhabitants of Zootopia as they transform in strange and interesting ways!
info.description:
In the lesser known parts of Zootopia there exists a small store owned by the most curious goat named Stephanie who has many wondrous things for sale, from magical items, to mysterious potions, to scientific marvels. If you're brave enough to enter her shop, you may find that what your heart desire's is a little bit of change in your life. And change will certainly happen, as one of the characters of the Zootopia movie plot stumbles on in, perhaps on accident or perhaps seeking a different perspective in the world.

Only you can say!

The primary focus will be on Nick and Judy, but please include other characters if you'd like! The only real rules are don't end the story and try to write chapters that aren't just one or two sentences, unless they're choice chapters, of course! And try to keep it in character as best you can.

Any sort of fetish stuff goes, from inflation, transformation, shrinking, growing, to anything in between! Be creative and have fun!
